trans-unit.source: Advanced LINQ to XML Programming (Visual Basic)
trans-unit.target: 進階的 LINQ to XML 程式設計 (Visual Basic)

trans-unit.source: This section provides information that will only be applicable to advanced developers in certain [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](../../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/sqltecxlinq_md.md)] scenarios.
trans-unit.target: 本節提供的資訊將僅適用於某些 [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](../../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/sqltecxlinq_md.md)] 案例中的進階開發人員。

trans-unit.source: In This Section
trans-unit.target: 本章節內容

trans-unit.source: Topic
trans-unit.target: 主題

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: [LINQ to XML Annotations](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/linq-to-xml-annotations.md)
trans-unit.target: [LINQ to XML 註釋](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/linq-to-xml-annotations.md)

trans-unit.source: Describes how to add annotations to [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](../../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/sqltecxlinq_md.md)] nodes and attributes.
trans-unit.target: 描述如何將附註加入到 [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](../../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/sqltecxlinq_md.md)] 節點和屬性。

trans-unit.source: [LINQ to XML Events (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/linq-to-xml-events.md)
trans-unit.target: [LINQ to XML 事件 (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/linq-to-xml-events.md)

trans-unit.source: Describes how to write event handlers for events that occur when you alter an XML tree.
trans-unit.target: 描述如何針對改變 XML 樹狀時發生的事件，撰寫事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: [Programming with Nodes (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/programming-with-nodes.md)
trans-unit.target: [程式設計的節點 (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/programming-with-nodes.md)

trans-unit.source: Describes how to query and manipulate nodes at a finer level of granularity than elements and attributes.
trans-unit.target: 描述如何以比項目和屬性還要細微的位移單位等級來查詢與管理節點。

trans-unit.source: [Mixed Declarative Code/Imperative Code Bugs (LINQ to XML) (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/mixed-declarative-code-imperative-code-bugs-linq-to-xml.md)
trans-unit.target: [宣告式程式碼/命令式混合程式碼 Bug (LINQ to XML) (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/mixed-declarative-code-imperative-code-bugs-linq-to-xml.md)

trans-unit.source: Describes the problems that appear when you mix declarative code (queries) with imperative code (code that modifies the XML tree).
trans-unit.target: 描述您混用宣告式程式碼 (查詢) 與命令性程式碼 (修改 XML 樹狀結構的程式碼) 時所出現的問題。

trans-unit.source: [How to: Stream XML Fragments with Access to Header Information (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/how-to-stream-xml-fragments-with-access-to-header-information.md)
trans-unit.target: [如何︰ 傳送資料流 XML 片段並存取標頭資訊 (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/how-to-stream-xml-fragments-with-access-to-header-information.md)

trans-unit.source: Describes how to stream XML fragments from an <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>.
trans-unit.target: 描述如何串流 XML 片段，從<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: You can use this technique to control the memory footprint of your application.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個技術來控制您應用程式的記憶體使用量。

trans-unit.source: [How to: Perform Streaming Transform of Large XML Documents (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/how-to-perform-streaming-transform-of-large-xml-documents.md)
trans-unit.target: [如何︰ 執行大型 XML 文件 (Visual Basic) 的資料流轉換](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/how-to-perform-streaming-transform-of-large-xml-documents.md)

trans-unit.source: Describes how to stream XML from an <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>, transform the XML fragment, and stream the output using <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XStreamingElement>.
trans-unit.target: 描述如何串流 XML <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>、 轉換 XML 片段，並使用<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XStreamingElement>.</xref:System.Xml.Linq.XStreamingElement>的輸出資料流</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: [How to: Read and Write an Encoded Document (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/how-to-read-and-write-an-encoded-document.md)
trans-unit.target: [如何︰ 讀取和寫入編碼的文件 (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/how-to-read-and-write-an-encoded-document.md)

trans-unit.source: Describes how to read and write XML documents that are encoded.
trans-unit.target: 描述如何讀取與寫入編碼的 XML 文件。

trans-unit.source: [Using XSLT to Transform an XML Tree (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/using-xslt-to-transform-an-xml-tree.md)
trans-unit.target: [使用 XSLT 轉換 XML 樹狀結構 (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/using-xslt-to-transform-an-xml-tree.md)

trans-unit.source: Describes how to transform an XML tree using XSLT.
trans-unit.target: 描述如何使用 XSLT 轉換 XML 樹狀。

trans-unit.source: [How to: Use Annotations to Transform LINQ to XML Trees in an XSLT Style (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/how-to-use-annotation-trees-to-transform-linq-to-xml-trees-in-an-xslt-style.md)
trans-unit.target: [如何︰ 使用註釋將 LINQ to XML 樹狀結構中的 XSLT 樣式 (Visual Basic) 轉換](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/how-to-use-annotation-trees-to-transform-linq-to-xml-trees-in-an-xslt-style.md)

trans-unit.source: Describes how annotations can be used to facilitate transforms of an XML tree.
trans-unit.target: 描述如何使用附註來簡化 XML 樹狀的轉換。

trans-unit.source: [Serializing Object Graphs that Contain XElement Objects (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/serializing-object-graphs-that-contain-xelement-objects.md)
trans-unit.target: [序列化包含 XElement 物件 (Visual Basic) 的物件圖形](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/serializing-object-graphs-that-contain-xelement-objects.md)

trans-unit.source: Describes how to serialize object graphs that contain <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement> and <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XDocument> objects.
trans-unit.target: 描述如何序列化包含的物件圖形<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement>和<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XDocument>物件。</xref:System.Xml.Linq.XDocument> </xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement>

trans-unit.source: [WPF Data Binding with LINQ to XML](https://docs.microsoft.com/visualstudio/designers/wpf-data-binding-with-linq-to-xml)
trans-unit.target: [WPF 資料繫結與 LINQ to XML](https://docs.microsoft.com/visualstudio/designers/wpf-data-binding-with-linq-to-xml)

trans-unit.source: Describes how to use LINQ to XML as the data source for data binding in Windows Presentation Foundation applications.
trans-unit.target: 描述如何使用 LINQ to XML 做為 Windows Presentation Foundation 應用程式中資料繫結的資料來源。

trans-unit.target: 另請參閱
